application-form.is-information-consented: To the best of my knowledge, all information above is true and accurate, and I consent to sharing my response with Employment and Social Development Canada

is-canadien-citizen.label: Are you a Canadian citizen, permanent resident, or protected person?
is-canadien-citizen.helper-text: A protected person is a person on whom refugee protection is conferred under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, and whose claim or application has not subsequently been deemed to be rejected under subsection 108(3), 109(3) or 114(4) or that Act.

education-level.label: What is your highest level of formal education completed, or enrolled in currently?
education-level.helper-text: Please note that there is no education requirement for this program.

personal-information.gender: To which gender identity do you most identify?

identity.header: Please select the description with which you identify.
identity.is-disabled: I am a person living with a disability
identity.is-minority: I am a member of a visible monority community
identity.indigenous-type: I am a member of an indigenous community
identity.is-lgbtq: I am a member of the LGBTQ2 community
identity.is-rural: I live in a rural or remote area
identity.is-newcomer: I am recent newcomer to Canada, within the last 5 years

personal-information.is-province-major-certified: I certify that I am over the age of majority in my province
personal-information.is-province-major-certified-link: Find the age of majority in your province
personal-information.language: In which official language would you prefer to be contacted?
personal-information.province: Which province or territory is your principle residence?

expression-of-interest-questions.skills-interest: Tell us about yourself, describe your strengths, passions and what motivates you. What skills or knowledge can you bring to the Canada Service Corps Civic Engagement Pilot?
expression-of-interest-questions.has-dedicated-device: Do you have access to a dedecated device on which to work?
expression-of-interest-questions.program-interest: The Civic Participation Pilot is aiming to ensure inclusivity of youth from diverse identities, demographics, learning styles and abilities and educational backgrounds - is there anything you feel would facilitate your participation in this pilot?
expression-of-interest-questions.hear-about-cpp: How did you hear about the Civic Participation Pilot?
expression-of-interest-questions.internet-quality: Do you have access to reliable internet?
expression-of-interest-questions.community-interest: If you could make a positive impact on one issue in your community what issue would you want to address and why?
